name: Tears In The Wind ✨
description:
In the digital realm, you can choose to feel whatever you want in whatever way you want. Tears don't have to be sad, they can look beautiful. Tears In The Wind shows the beauty in sadness and the calm it brings afterwards.

3D make-up by Ines Alpha
Background graphics and modeling by Nicole Ruggiero

Tears in the Wind has been shown at the following exhibitions:

MFK, 'SUPER', Berne, 2021
Meta.Morf X, Trondheim Biennale Center, Norway, 2020
Link In Bio, MDBK, Leipzig, 2019
DeCode x Hervisions, Art Basel, CADAF, Miami, 2019
Non-Stick Nostalgia, MAD, New York, 2019
Post Vision, Body Optimized, LES Manhattan, 2019
Hervisions x ArtNight, London 2019
The Future Of Body And Beauty, Cosnova convention, Frankfurt, 2019
Festival Maintenant, ‘Metamorphoses 3.0’, Rennes, 2019
